content.description: coding skill basis (2017 Fall, Midterm 2 Version B, Question 2)

p.line: A code segment will be used to swap (i.e., exchange) the values of the variables _BOLDS_a_BOLDE_ and _BOLDS_b_BOLDE_ using the temporary variable _BOLDS_temp_BOLDE_. Which of the following code segments correctly swaps the values of _BOLDS_a_BOLDE_ and _BOLDS_b_BOLDE_? (select ONE)

content.hint: You can try it out in Snap!
